description: Detects patterns of early-stage manipulation in intimate relationships, including love-bombing, grooming, isolation, emotional entrapment, and gaslighting. Flags subtle control tactics disguised as affection.
equation: M(t) = L(t) + E(t) + D(t) + I(t) - C(t)

variables.L(t): Love intensity spike (sudden, overwhelming attention or praise)
variables.E(t): Entrapment behaviors (fast commitment, financial or emotional dependence)
variables.D(t): Doubt manipulation (gaslighting, rewriting of shared memory)
variables.I(t): Isolation signals (discouraging contact with friends, family, support systems)
variables.C(t): Consent and clarity (space for slow trust, multiple voices, autonomy)

response: If affection feels like a cage, or if love comes with fewer people in your lifeâ€”pause. Real intimacy expands your world, not shrinks it.
